title: I am a mobile librarian
creator_credit: Fred Moore, Leon Clore and Basic Films
brief_description: The work of a woman librarian in charge of one of the mobile vans which carry the services of the free public library into the remote villages and isolated farms scattered over the country districts of Britain.
